attributes.action: Legalize recreational and medical use cannabis and cannabis products.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe in democracy in Britain and democracy is to follow general opinion of the general majority of the public. 
And I believe the majority of the British public would agree that cannabis being illegal is a waist of police time, money and a terrible toll on the person who will receive a criminal record basically limiting one’s life over smoking a popular and not overly harmful drug when compared to other drugs such as alcohol or tobacco witch are much worst on the human body.
attributes.background:
To legalize medical and recreational use of cannabis so that it can be purchased and used in a safe environment and to be treated such as alcohol. 
To be taxed to have to meet health and safety standards and be consumed by people over 18 not in public areas.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627573
